sentence.Network_en: Don't give me any aggro or I'll call the police.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要对我使用暴力，不然我就叫警察。

sentence.Network_en: They could see there wasn't going to be any aggro and they left us to it.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们知道不会再有暴力行为发生，于是就留给我们处理。

sentence.Network_en: Simply phone the ticket hot-line and all that aggro will be a thing of the past.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要拨打订票热线，所有难题都将成为过去式。

PerfectNetExp.abs: aggrieved 受虐待的aggro 暴力aghast 惊骇的
仇恨（Aggro）指的是获得，控制或失去敌对NPC对玩家的攻击意图。激战2的仇恨系统非常简单 — NPC选择的目标基本上基于对距 …
irritation-英汉词典-英中字典-速译通... ... [pathology( 病理学)] [aggro( 暴力行为)] [last straw( 导致失败之最后一击)].

list.abs: volley of Shadow Swords : launches swords at one target not the main aggro .暗影箭连射：向一个目标发射出很多的暗影箭，非主要攻击者。
this is useful when you want to drag it along and have it get aggro at start or when in instances and you want to share the Blood Pact buff with everyone .这是有用的当您想将它拖到相处，没有它在启动时获得仇恨或情况时，你要共享血液条约与大家迷。
crushing Dark : deals 1500 shadow damage and stuns all targets within 30m for 2s , wipes aggro .黑暗破碎：1500点的暗影伤害，30米内的所有目标晕眩2秒，清除攻击技能。
Were we in for more aggro ?, 我们还要继续闹事吗?

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1960s: abbreviation of aggravation (see aggravate),or of aggression

entry.def: Aggro is the difficulties and problems that are involved in something.

example.ex: Simply phone the ticket hot-line and all that aggro will be a thing of the past.
example.tran: 只要拨打订票热线，所有难题都将成为过去式。

entry.def: Aggro is aggressive or violent behaviour.

example.ex: They could see there wasn't going to be any aggro and they left us to it.
example.tran: 他们知道不会再有暴力行为发生，于是就留给我们处理。

sentences.sentence: "I skipped it because it was too much aggro"

auth_sentence.content: Yeah, my socket's giving me some right aggro, I'll 'ave you know.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yeah, my socket's giving me some right aggro, I'll 'ave you know.

auth_sentence.content: This place is small and gets packed, but people don't get aggro about space.
auth_sentence.res_content: This place is small and gets packed, but people don't get aggro about space.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This place is small and gets packed, but people don't get aggro about space.

auth_sentence.content: "When you walk around the street wearing make-up, you do get more aggro," he says.
auth_sentence.res_content: "When you walk around the street wearing make-up, you do get more aggro," he says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "When you walk around the street wearing make-up, you do get more aggro," he says.
